To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private HikkakeModified _hikkakemodified;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_hikkakemodified = HikkakeModified(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_hikkakemodified.IsReady)
{
    var current = _hikkakemodified.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.hikkakemodified = self.HikkakeModified(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.hikkakemodified.IsReady:
    current = self.hikkakemodified.Current.Value
